question: Which state government is to give Sports persons 5% reservation in government jobs?
explanation: The sportspersons in Madhya Pradesh will now get a 5 per cent reservation state government jobs. The state government of Madhya Pradesh has announced 5% reservation to national and international medallists sportspersons in state government jobs. The announcement in this regard was made by Madhya Pradesh Minister of Sports and Youth Welfare Jitu Patwari while inaugurating the Regional Olympic Games at Kampoo sports complex in Gwalior.In addition to this, under-16 zonal Olympics will be held in Madhya Pradesh to facilitate talented children.
